jobDescription: Requisition Number: 28097 Job Title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION ANALYST, PRINCIPAL Working Title: Project Director/Research Scientist Salary: $5,325 - $10,533 monthly Job Type: Contract Department Name: 1916-CANCER PREVENTION&CNTRL; RESEARCH Department Website URL: Job Summary Statement: Under the general direction of Center Leadership, serve as Project Director/Research Scientist for community-based research projects in the UCLA Kaiser Permanente Center for Health Equity and the Center for Cancer Prevention and Control Research in the UCLA Fielding School of Public Health and the Jonsson Comprehensive Cancer Center. The individual assuming this position will join a dynamic and productive research team engaged in a broad and rich portfolio of research to address health disparities. The incumbent will have the opportunity to further his/her research skills by participating in the development of grant proposals and co-authoring scientific manuscripts and presentations. Responsibilities of this position include the following: plan and implement research activities; coordinate and facilitate the daily operations of projects on campus and at community sites; manage the collection, organization, and presentation of research data; work with community partners to develop and implement interventions; train and oversee project staff working on campus and at community partner sites. Examples of community-partnered research projects include studies to improve HPV vaccination in community and clinical safety-net settings, obesity control among preschool age children, and research to improve uptake of multiple cancer screening tests and other preventive health measures.
